system.runtime.serialization

Interface ISerializationEventHandler


  • public interface ISerializationEventHandler
    The Java interface to be implemented to receive events from the CLR using SerializationEventHandler.

    .NET documentation at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationEventHandler
